serviceBlock.title: Software development services we kick ass on

main.title: Solid Devs
main.subtitle: Your path to digital transformation
main.description: We develop, design, automate and manage, applying our engineering expertise to the best solutions for your business.

reasons.title: Why Solid?
reasons.team__desc: Our team consists of professionals with experience in areas such as software development, design, testing, marketing and sale.
reasons.approach__desc: We understand that each project is unique, so we always set up our approach to the development of the software in accordance with the specific needs and goals of our customers.
reasons.experience__desc: We have more than 10 years of experience in the development of software and during this time we have been able to create many high-quality and innovative products.
reasons.quality__desc: We pay special attention to the quality of our software and always strive to surpass the expectations of our customers.
reasons.support__desc: We do not just create software for our customers, we also provide constant support after its launch.
reasons.price__desc: We offer competitive prices for our services, without reducing the quality of our software and the level of service.

webMain.title: Web development
webMain.description: Creating a website or creating a custom web application is the result of great teamwork. Everyone participates in it: software engineers, designers, markup developers and other specialists. Choosing the right web development agency is the first step to getting a quality web solution that satisfies the customer.
